price: E, se lhes abríssemos uma porta do céu, e eles seguissem ascendendo a ela,
arabic: وَلَوۡ فَتَحۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم بَابٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَظَلُّواْ فِيهِ يَعۡرُجُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walaw fataḥnā ʿalayhim bāban mina al-samāi faẓallū fīhi yaʿrujūna
